assignment.name: Basic Concepts : 4) Input / Add Three Numbers

files.name: main.py
files.content:
# Brandon Sureda
#2019-09-18

A= input ("Please enter a number:") 

A=int(A)

B= input ("Please enter another number:")

B=int(B)

C= input ("Please enter a third number:")

C=int(C)

print ((A),"plus",(B),"plus",(C),"equals", (A+B+C))
